NUMBER_ONE_BOSS_MUG.name: #1 Boss Mug
NUMBER_ONE_BOSS_MUG.description: Create Healing Field upon Receiving Damage
NUMBER_ONE_BOSS_MUG.descriptionLong:
Heal Cooldown: 10s
Field Duration: 5 Seconds
Healing: 12 per Second

A ceramic coffee mug belonging to the #1 boss

A mug, sunk to the bottom of the sea, carries within itself the entire ocean.

EIGHT_BALL.name: 8-Ball
EIGHT_BALL.descriptionLong:
Bonus Damage: +30%
Projectile Spread: +20

An inky-black sphere made of smooth ivory

Within the Midnight Pool, each ball lands in its predetermined pocket regardless of the angle of the stroke.

ABYSSAL_INSIGNIA.name: Abyssal Insignia
ABYSSAL_INSIGNIA.descriptionLong:
Bonus Attack Speed: +10% at 50% Max Hp
Increases to up to +50% as Hp decreases

A twisted bone sigil used in the worship of Bright Ones

Artifacts carried into the deepest recesses of the abyss find their form warped by an insurmountable pressure.

ADMINISTRATOR_CARD.name: Administrator Card
ADMINISTRATOR_CARD.descriptionLong:
An inornate identification card printed on sturdy plastic

Salvagers are rarely promoted to administrative positions, and are thus seldom seen carrying these coveted tokens.

ALBATROSS_NECKLACE.name: Albatross Necklace
ALBATROSS_NECKLACE.descriptionLong:
Bonus Max Hp: 75
Weight Increase: +60%

A burdensome necklet in the form of an albatross wingspan

A conscience, weighed down with guilt, inevitably drags its bearer into the depths of the Midnight Pool.

AMDAHLS_LOTUS.name: Amdahl's Lotus
AMDAHLS_LOTUS.description: +Hp and Fuel Regeneration when Match Timer is low
AMDAHLS_LOTUS.descriptionLong:
Timer Threshold: 20% Max Timer
Hp Regeneration: +40 per Second
Fuel Regeneration: +15 per Second

An immaculate blossom that unfurls during pivotal moments of conflict

Representing Upper Management, the lotus conferred upon its bearer the duty of conveying to humanity: commands, responses and eventually, apologies.

ANARCHISTS_COOKBOOK.name: Anarchist's Cookbook
ANARCHISTS_COOKBOOK.descriptionLong:
Bomb Spawn Interval: 3 Seconds
Bomb Damage: 40

A singed manuscript describing the author's favorite baking recipes

Anarchists seeking chaos amidst the Noiseless Sea would be disappointed by the order that arose around newly submerged Bright Ones.

ANCHOR_AMULET.name: Anchor Amulet
ANCHOR_AMULET.descriptionLong:
Grounded Damage Resistance: +60%

A metal charm depicting the company insignia; a stalwart anchor

Management long held the belief that to forgo one's connection to the Earth would be to irreversibly abandon humanity.

ANCIENT_SYNAPSE.name: Ancient Synapse
ANCIENT_SYNAPSE.descriptionLong:
Delayed Damage: 1 + 15% Total Delayed Damage per Second

The petrified nervous tissue of a drowned behemoth

To those willing to abandon physical sensation, the Noiseless Sea offers a quiet and peaceful haven to observe eternity.

AU_COURANT.name: Au Courant
AU_COURANT.descriptionLong:
Reload Speed Reduction: -20%

A flowing sash woven from current-swept fabric

All Sunk things, resigned to their fates, make a habit of keeping current and going with the flow.

BACKPACK_BUDDY.name: Backpack Buddy
BACKPACK_BUDDY.descriptionLong:
Max Hp Reduction: -25%

A sodden doll that once occupied a child's backpack

While some Sunk cling to relics of their former lives, they ultimately reach their final destinations empty-handed.

BENTHIC_DESIRES.name: Benthic Desires
BENTHIC_DESIRES.description: Regenerate Fuel when not moving, In Multiplayer, also Regenerate Hp
BENTHIC_DESIRES.descriptionLong:
Hp Regeneration: 9 per Second
Fuel Regeneration: 14 per Second

An individual's oneness with the unchanging Earth

The Stagnation that muddies the firmament at the bottom of the world is derived from the collective desires of the fearful and the weary.

BLASTEMA.name: Blastema
BLASTEMA.description: Temporarily Boosts Hp Regeneration upon Receiving Damage
BLASTEMA.descriptionLong:
Regen Duration: 4 Seconds
Regen: 2.5% Max Hp per Second

A cluster of self-replicating cells used to regrow damaged tissue

Few products leave the shelves of the Sunk Emporium as quickly as locally-grown spare limbs of all shapes and sizes.

BLOODWOODS_GLOVE.name: Bloodwood's Glove
BLOODWOODS_GLOVE.descriptionLong:
Bonus Charge Rate: 30%

A pristine white glove once worn by an esteemed company researcher

Within the endless halls of a sterile labyrinth, a man sits studiously making puppets in the shapes of your loved ones.

BOOK_OF_BURIAL.name: Book of Burial
BOOK_OF_BURIAL.description: Drop a Mine Upon Receiving Damage
BOOK_OF_BURIAL.descriptionLong:
Mine Cooldown: 7.5 Seconds
Prime Delay: 2 Seconds
Mine Damage: 60

A collection of teachings regarding the sending off of the deceased

The knowledge and languages of the Sunk conclude within the Pit of Tongues where they serve as sustenance for things burrowed within the sediment.

BOTTOM_OF_THE_BARREL.name: Bottom of the Barrel
BOTTOM_OF_THE_BARREL.description: +Damage and Attack Speed with Low Ammo
BOTTOM_OF_THE_BARREL.descriptionLong:
Ammo Threshold: 25%
Bonus Damage: +100%
Bonus Attack Speed: +25%

A wooden slat encrusted with resentful detritus

The grinders of the Kamaboko-Ya are welcoming to even the lowliest of dregs seeking to be remade.

BRIGGLES_BLADED_BOOT.name: Briggle's Bladed Boot
BRIGGLES_BLADED_BOOT.descriptionLong:
Stomp Damage: 80

The serrated footwear belonging to a general renowned for being armed to the feet

General Briggle's reign of ruthless military efficacy abruptly ended when he met his end stepping into an inflatable life raft.

BRITTLING_POWDER.name: Brittling Powder
BRITTLING_POWDER.descriptionLong:
Frag Cooldown: 0.5 Second
Frag Number: 8
Frag Damage: 15

A pouch of insidious powder that renders objects brittle upon the slightest of contact

Residents of the Kamaboko-Ya have accepted that the destruction of their physical bodies is a necessary step in the factory's ungodly process.

BUCKET_OF_BATTERIES.name: Bucket of Batteries
BUCKET_OF_BATTERIES.descriptionLong:
Lightning Cooldown: 0.5 Second
Lightning Damage: 11
Lightning Chains: 4 Enemies

A bucket filled with batteries floating in a dubious liquid

The Plenum Chamber's mechanical palpitations provide sufficient energy to nearby facilities, but its own power source remains indiscernible.

BUTTONMAN_BUTTONS.name: Buttonman Buttons
BUTTONMAN_BUTTONS.description: +Fuel Regeneration and Reload Speed upon Player Killstreak
BUTTONMAN_BUTTONS.descriptionLong:
Fuel Regeneration: 3 per Second for every Kill.
Reload Speed: +15% for every Kill.
Killstreak Reset upon Death.

A handful of buttons commemorating each life taken on behalf of the company

Awards and honors are distributed unsparingly in the Salvaging business to provide a sense of pride or perhaps entanglement.

CALL_OF_THE_VOID.name: Call of the Void
CALL_OF_THE_VOID.descriptionLong:
Bonus Damage: +30%
Damage Resistance: -30%

A sinister mark in the shape of a spiral

The ocean's genesis was wrought by the blessing of the Spiral and its terminus will be defined in the same manner.

CARLOCS_THESIS.name: Carloc's Thesis
CARLOCS_THESIS.descriptionLong:
Redirection Amount: 25 Degrees

Some headache-inducing ramblings printed on a spatially impossible pamphlet

Our problems are all rooted in our reluctance to deny responsibility for them.

CASTAWAYS_TRAVELOGUE.name: Castaway's Travelogue
CASTAWAYS_TRAVELOGUE.description: Restores Fuel Upon Running out of Fuel
CASTAWAYS_TRAVELOGUE.descriptionLong:
Fuel Cooldown: 10s
Fuel Regen: +50

A largely uneventful diary of someone lost at sea

There is little room for castaways to float in the ever dwindling space above this ocean, yet beneath the next one.

CATALOG_OF_WANT.name: Catalog of Want
CATALOG_OF_WANT.description: Spend Hp to use Uncharged Magic
CATALOG_OF_WANT.descriptionLong:
Cooldown: 2 Seconds
Hp Cost: 4 Hp per 1 Second Charge

The last edition of a demonic shopping catalog that has ceased publication

The unrequited desires of the drowned are memorialized but not satisfied within the annals of the Pit of Tongues.

CELESTIAL_ANOINTMENT.name: Celestial Anointment
CELESTIAL_ANOINTMENT.descriptionLong:
Charge Rate Reduction: -15%

A vial of twinkling ichor originating from far above

Even the slightest remnant of a Bright One is best kept insulated within an inert liquid of appropriate volume.

CHAOS_CONJURANT.name: Chaos Conjurant
CHAOS_CONJURANT.descriptionLong:
Meteor Cooldown: 5 Seconds
Meteor Number: 5
Meteor Damage: 28

A reagent of newly-formed and disorderly energy

Management has long sought communion with inexplicable forces in the hopes of defying the natural order that has consigned the world to stagnation.

CLAWS_OF_FESTUS.name: Claws of Festus
CLAWS_OF_FESTUS.descriptionLong:
A pair of wiry clawed gloves, once used for transmission of vibrations

Behind the curtains of a silent theater, a man wanders in vain pursuit of the source of a song no one else can hear.

CLOCKWISE_CAGE.name: Clockwise Cage
CLOCKWISE_CAGE.descriptionLong:
Echo Cooldown: 2 Seconds

A metal birdcage occupied by a temporally improbable bird

Time, like all other things, flows according to the arbitrary whims of ocean currents.

CODEX_OF_SALVORS_LAW.name: Codex of Salvor's Law
CODEX_OF_SALVORS_LAW.descriptionLong:
Bonus Max Fuel: 20
Bonus Reflect Damage: +75%

A leatherbound tome requesting that salvagers try a little harder to get along

A rigorous system once presided over inter-salvager affairs before the endless expanse of ocean made such interactions infrequent.

COMMUTERS_PARASOL.name: Commuter's Parasol
COMMUTERS_PARASOL.descriptionLong:
Shield Interval: 6 Seconds
Shield Duration 3 Seconds

A worn but durable umbrella painted with a pattern of vines

A Salvager will never know a world where a sturdy umbrella is all that is needed to get to work dry.

COMPOUND_VITREOUS.name: Compound Vitreous
COMPOUND_VITREOUS.descriptionLong:
An iridescent compound eye made of glassy organic material

Only through special means can individuals see beyond the firmaments that lie at the top and bottom of the world.

CONFIDENCE.name: Confidence
CONFIDENCE.descriptionLong:
Hp Threshold: 90%

Bonus Damage: +50%

The fragile and fleeting feeling that everything will be alright

"Have faith that this whole ordeal will either hurt very little or very briefly."

CROWN_OF_THORNS.name: Crown of Thorns
CROWN_OF_THORNS.descriptionLong:
Thorns Cooldown: 0.5 Second
Thorns Number: 6
Thorns Damage: 24

The body of a spiky echinoderm that doubles as protective headgear

Of all impulses retained by Sunk things, the most common is the simple desire to not be touched.

CURIOUS_SAUCE.name: Curious Sauce
CURIOUS_SAUCE.descriptionLong:
A jar of a most very curious sauce

Countless unsolved oddities preceding the ocean's advent now outlive the ones that sought to study them.

CURSED_CILICE.name: Cursed Cilice
CURSED_CILICE.descriptionLong:
Fuel Regen: 150% of Damage Received

A band lined with thorns along its innermost layer

The deeper the ocean layer, the greater the cost of entrance that must be paid in life or thereafter.

DAS_BOOT.name: Das Boot
DAS_BOOT.descriptionLong:
Reloading Damage Resistance: +55%

A metal shoe complete with a dorsal periscope

Humanity's countless attempts to breach the abyss have recently become less about curiosity and more about necessity.

DAY_AT_THE_FAIR.name: Day at the Fair
DAY_AT_THE_FAIR.descriptionLong:
Max Hp: +45%
Knockback Resistance: -150%

Some mirthful fairgrounds reflected in a handful of colorful balloons

Like all things that hold particular value, the childhood memories of the departed are delivered to the Sunk Emporium to be packaged for resale.

DEAD_MANS_HAND.name: Dead Man's Hand
DEAD_MANS_HAND.descriptionLong:
The petrified hand of nothing in particular

A Salvager's suit must withstand both the pressures of the deep as well as the crushing grasps of the departed.

DEPLORABLE_APPARATUS.name: Deplorable Apparatus
DEPLORABLE_APPARATUS.descriptionLong:
Hp Regeneration: 13 per Second
Upon Receiving Damage, Cancel Regen for 1s

A rusty, surgically-attached life granting machine

Freed from the limitations of their physical bodies, the Sunk find their lifespans linked to that of the ocean itself.

DIATOMACEOUS_EARTH.name: Diatomaceous Earth
DIATOMACEOUS_EARTH.description: Temporarily boosts Damage Resistance and Knockback Resistance upon using Magic
DIATOMACEOUS_EARTH.descriptionLong:
Buff Duration: 50% of Charge Time
Damage Resistance: +75%
Knockback Resistance: +90%

The powdery remains of countless microscopic Bright Ones

While not as luminous as a living specimen, the husks left behind by dead or transcendent Bright Ones are known to have enigmatic properties of their own.

EELSKIN_COVER.name: Eelskin Cover
EELSKIN_COVER.descriptionLong:
Ground Drag Reduction: -60%
Air Drag Reduction: -40%

A slick coat that lets its wearer slide through the water slimily

After an eternity of swallowing bland repast, the God-Eel, Pokey, began to covet the flavor of its subjects.

EMAUDELINES_PRISM.name: Emaudeline's Prism
EMAUDELINES_PRISM.descriptionLong:
Ranged Attack Speed Reduction: -75%
Reload Speed Reduction: -50%

A transparent prism that splits light into an incomplete rainbow

Atop a platform overlooking the carapaces of her brethren, a woman stares into an everlasting source of light.

EPHEMERA_PERPETUA.name: Ephemera Perpetua
EPHEMERA_PERPETUA.description: Gain Magic Charge upon Killing Enemies
EPHEMERA_PERPETUA.descriptionLong:
Magic Charge: 10 Seconds on Player Kill, 1.0 Second on Monster Kill

<adjective> <noun_abstract> of <color> <noun_material>

<poem>

ERSATZ_SMILE.name: Ersatz Smile
ERSATZ_SMILE.descriptionLong:
Bonus Backstab Damage: +80%

A wooden grin made of stiff and synthetic material

Those that can survive the abyss with their face exposed are never as human as they may seem.

EXTRA_ROW_OF_TEETH.name: Extra Row of Teeth
EXTRA_ROW_OF_TEETH.descriptionLong:
Bonus Clip Size: +30%

A row of misshapen teeth; each designed to rend a different prey

Upon bearing witness to the First Bright One, the God-Eel, Pokey, had but a single wish; more teeth.

FALLACY_OF_FLESH.name: Fallacy of Flesh
FALLACY_OF_FLESH.descriptionLong:
Bonus Max Hp: +70%

An illegible riddle carved into the flesh of an unknown beast

The many gods floating within the empty ocean have nothing to subsist upon besides each other.

FARADAYS_CAGE.name: Faraday Cage
FARADAYS_CAGE.descriptionLong:
Damage Resistance: 50% of Fuel Consumed

A conductive mesh used to protect from electromagnetic fields

The presence of Bright Ones often impairs conventional technology, forcing Management to equip Salvagers with equally unfathomable tools.

FEELING_OF_BEING_WATCHED.name: Feeling of Being Watched
FEELING_OF_BEING_WATCHED.descriptionLong:
Fuel Threshold: 20% Max Fuel
Bonus Damage: +40%

The unyielding gaze of nothing in particular

A salvager cannot avert the gaze of that which he is submerged within.

FENS_CLIPPED_WINGS.name: Fen's Clipped Wings
FENS_CLIPPED_WINGS.descriptionLong:
Bonus Jump Power: +20%

A pair of tattered insect wings singed by a bright light

Inside a sprawling semaphore at the world's apex, a woman communes with a higher power in hopes of salvation.

THE_FINGER.name: The Finger
THE_FINGER.descriptionLong:
Emote Damage: 90

A single digit, extended in an offensive gesture

Violence is the foremost form of self-expression permitted to veteran Salvagers.

FORAGERS_HIVE.name: Forager's Hive
FORAGERS_HIVE.descriptionLong:
Bees Cooldown: 0.8 Second

A decrepit heirloom infested with a colony of aggressive insects

Unwavering commitment to a singular task can lead to unforeseen destinations.

FRACTURE_PLATE.name: Fracture Plate
FRACTURE_PLATE.description: Periodically gain a Damage Blocking Shield
FRACTURE_PLATE.descriptionLong:
Shield Cooldown: 4 Seconds Without Receiving Damage

Shield Damage Block: 20% Max Hp

A calcified plate consisting of several nondescript bones fused together

The deepest layers of the ocean are reserved for those who shouldered the heaviest burdens in life.

GEMMULE.name: Gemmule
GEMMULE.descriptionLong:
Bonus Spawn Invulnerability Duration: 8 Seconds

A spongy layer of material that functions as a protective coating

The budding subjects of the Neptune King's Garden must be tended to diligently if they are to bear fruit.

GLUTTONOUS_GREY_GLOVE.name: Gluttonous Grey Grove
GLUTTONOUS_GREY_GLOVE.description: Occasionally Drop Health upon Killing Enemies
GLUTTONOUS_GREY_GLOVE.descriptionLong:
Hp Drop Chance: 100% on Player Kill, 20% on Monster Kill
Hp Pickup: 25% Victim's Max Hp

An article of carnivorous handwear with an appetite for flesh

It is a fish-eat-fish world out there.

GOMEZS_AMYGDALA.name: Gomez's Amygdala
GOMEZS_AMYGDALA.description: Temporarily Boosts Speed and Damage upon Receiving Damage
GOMEZS_AMYGDALA.descriptionLong:
Buff Duration: 3 Seconds
Bonus Speed: +50%
Bonus Damage: +40%

A piece of grey matter floating in fluid and radiating with psychic energy

Bright Ones are receptive to the primal emotions of passersby, making it paramount to suppress fear in their presence.

GOOD_HEALTH.name: Good Health
GOOD_HEALTH.descriptionLong:
Bonus Max Hp: +40%

The manifestation of good physical health

The strict exercise regimen followed by Salvagers ensures that they remain too preoccupied to start getting the wrong idea again.

HEART_OF_SPEROS.name: Heart of Speros
HEART_OF_SPEROS.descriptionLong:
Fuel Spent: 60% Max Fuel / Weapon Clip Size

The synthetic heart-replacement belonging to an overworked employee

To overcome the ocean itself, Management needed to engineer a tool as inexorable as the tides.

HONEYED_TENEBRAE.name: Honeyed Tenebrae
HONEYED_TENEBRAE.descriptionLong:
Bee Damage Resistance: +80%

A cloyingly sweet lozenge masking a bitter center

Gathered in the shadow of the False Sun, God and supplicant both renounced their long-held inhibitions.

HOOD_OF_HABIT.name: Hood of Habit
HOOD_OF_HABIT.description: Become Invisible upon Receiving Critical Damage
HOOD_OF_HABIT.descriptionLong:
Hp Threshold: 50% Max Hp
Invisibility Duration: 10 Seconds

A ragged hood saturated with the stench of smoke

Much to the chagrin of its residents, the Noiseless Sea has never kicked its addiction to cyclical destruction and rebirth.

HORNS_OF_AMMON.name: Horns of Ammon
HORNS_OF_AMMON.description: Temporarily Gain Invulnerability upon Receiving Damage
HORNS_OF_AMMON.descriptionLong:
Damage Threshold: 5
Invincibility Duration: 1 Seconds

The curved horns of a submerged deity

The ocean and its contents are fated to spend eternity flowing from one spiral to the next.

HUMANITY_MODULE.name: Humanity Module
HUMANITY_MODULE.description: +Magic Charge Rate, Reroll Magic on Use
HUMANITY_MODULE.descriptionLong:
Bonus Charge Rate: +50%

A disk encoding data in an unreadable format

Management could never agree amongst themselves which aspects of humanity could not be relinquished without also losing the label of 'human'.

ICE9.name: Ice-9
ICE9.descriptionLong:
Slow Cooldown: 2 Seconds
Slow Duration: 2 Seconds
Slow Amount: -80%

A frosty vial of a world-ending substance

The sunken world was made to be fragile by those who anticipated the need to start over from scratch.

INFORMANTS_TIE.name: Informant's Tie
INFORMANTS_TIE.descriptionLong:
An orange tie ragged from years of nervous hand-rubbing

The Whale-God, Callo, inherited humanity's desire to unravel the mysteries of the universe and was easily seduced by the inscrutable murmuring of the First Bright One.

IRON_SIGHTS.name: Iron Sights
IRON_SIGHTS.descriptionLong:
Recoil Reduction: -100%
Bonus Projectile Speed: +25%

A metal scope to be affixed to the end of a firearm

After granting the wishes of three Gods, the First Bright One attained a luminosity so intense that even the eye at the bottom of the sea could not stare into it.

JELLOFELLOW_COSPLAY.name: Jellofellow Cosplay
JELLOFELLOW_COSPLAY.descriptionLong:
Bonus Max Hp: +40%

A costume of a long-forgotten cartoon character

The more thoroughly erased a civilization, the smaller the difference between its historical figures and cereal-box mascots.

JURY_RIGGED_BINDINGS.name: Jury-Rigged Bindings
JURY_RIGGED_BINDINGS.description: Fires Your Inactive Weapons when Attacking
JURY_RIGGED_BINDINGS.descriptionLong:
Attack Interval: 20% Attack Speed of Inactive Weapon

A well-worn noose used for turning many into one

Well-laid plans to stay afloat are squandered if they are bound to those fated to sink

KERMUNGLER.name: Kermungler
KERMUNGLER.descriptionLong:
Damage Dealt and Received Variance: +50%
Damage Amplification: +10%
Damage Resistance: +10%

In ideal tool for kermungling things

The lifestyle of humanity prior to the great flood is best preserved in their relics of war.

KINEATER.name: Kineater
KINEATER.descriptionLong:
Boss Hp Reduction: -15%

A wriggling invertebrate that attaches to host membranes with a hooked tail

Burrowed in the flesh of unsuspecting hosts, parasites are often carried by currents to destinations not befitting themselves.

KINESIS_LENS.name: Kinesis Lens
KINESIS_LENS.descriptionLong:
A convex lens that allows the user to perceive the flow of unseen things

Understanding the ocean's adjudication of Sunk things is key to the remote projection of one's will.

KUMQUAT.name: Kumquat
KUMQUAT.description: Regenerate Hp upon falling below 50% Hp.
KUMQUAT.descriptionLong:
Hp Regen: 35% Max Hp over 1 second
Activates once per life

A sweet and tangy fruit with an aromatic peel

Remove peels from pickled kumquats and soak them overnight. Grind kumquats, add chili pepper, white pepper and cook on low heat. Add kumquat marinade to savory meat dishes.

LAMPREY_IDOL.name: Lamprey Idol
LAMPREY_IDOL.descriptionLong:
Lifesteal: 10% Against Players, 2% Against Monsters
Hp Threshold: 50%
Damage Received: 2.5 Per Second

A metal figure with the appearance of a parasitic, blood-sucking fish

From the dreaming carcass of the Whale-God, Callo, a wriggling mass emerged to disseminate into the pits below.

LEATHERBACK.name: Leatherback
LEATHERBACK.descriptionLong:
Bonus Backstab Resistance: +60%

A sturdy, calcified deterrent to betrayal

Thwart backstab attempts by pulling your body inside-out until your "back" is inward-facing and out of reach.

LOAMSKIN_LOCKET.name: Loamskin Locket
LOAMSKIN_LOCKET.descriptionLong:
Bonus Max Hp: +60%

A locket containing a glass capsule filled with fertile soil

To the unborn, the Garden of the Neptune King offers a vivid taste of long-lost,  terrestrial warmth.

LOCH_SHIELD.name: Loch Shield
LOCH_SHIELD.descriptionLong:
Fire Damage Resistance: +40%
Explosion Damage Resistance: +40%

A hefty targe made from salvaged metals

The only thing that separates man from God from fish is a large body of water.

LOSS_OF_SENSES.name: Loss of Senses
LOSS_OF_SENSES.descriptionLong:
Bonus Max Hp: +25% - +100%
Bonus Hp is random and invisible

LOTUS_LANTERN.name: Lotus Lantern
LOTUS_LANTERN.descriptionLong:
Bonus Max Hp: +15%
Bonus Eggplant Drop: 25%

An ornamental lantern made from waxen paper

Dissatisfied with the gifts of the First Bright One, the Crab-God, Slick, illuminated the abyss below in search of more shining things.

LUMINOUS_ESCA.name: Luminous Esca
LUMINOUS_ESCA.descriptionLong:
4s to Completely Blind Enemies

A glowing clump of particles used to attract prey

Through natural processes, fragments of Bright Ones are shed to form smaller, distinct progeny.

MACHINE_GHOST.name: Machine Ghost
MACHINE_GHOST.descriptionLong:
An immaterial wisp of crackling energy

The departed souls of inanimate machines are repurposed within the Plenum Chamber to continue serving what remains of humanity.

MANGROVE_SEED.name: Mangrove Seed
MANGROVE_SEED.descriptionLong:
Poison Damage Resistance: +80%

The seed of an extinct tree known for water filtration

Enthralled by the First Bright One's luster, the Crab-God, Slick aspired to filter from the sea the trace remnants of the herald's brethren.

MASK_OF_SYMPATHY.name: Mask of Sympathy
MASK_OF_SYMPATHY.description: Drains Enemy Fuel upon Receiving Damage
MASK_OF_SYMPATHY.descriptionLong:
Fuel Drained: 50% of Damage Received

An uncomfortable ritual mask possessing several gold-sealed cracks

The three former Gods that once governed the Noiseless Sea had unusually little enmity with their celestial usurpers.

MATTER_UNIVERSALIZER.name: Matter Universalizer
MATTER_UNIVERSALIZER.descriptionLong:
Fuel Regenerated: 75 on Player Kill, 25 on Monster Kill

A handheld energy-conversion device

Regardless of what or who enters the grinders of the Kamaboko-Ya, the end result looks and tastes the same.

MOON_FLUTHER.name: Moon Fluther
MOON_FLUTHER.descriptionLong:
Bonus Hover Power: +25%
Hover Cost Reduction: -25%

A gelatinous wad that is always extended towards the moon

Bright Ones and the elusive Goldfish share a propensity for breaching the layers of the world, albeit, in opposite directions.

MOUTHBREATHER_CERTIFICATE.name: Mouthbreather Certificate
MOUTHBREATHER_CERTIFICATE.descriptionLong:
Self-Damage Resistance: +90%

Protective padding to be worn by fledgling or suicidal salvagers

Management's long list of attempts to reduce the high attrition rate of Salvaging does not include the ceasing of high-risk operations.

MOUTHFUL_OF_BEES.name: Mouthful of Bees
MOUTHFUL_OF_BEES.description: Release Bees Upon Receiving Damage or Dying
MOUTHFUL_OF_BEES.descriptionLong:
Release 1 Bee per 20 Damage received.
Release 5 Bees on death.

MRRMPH MMPH MRRGL FRRRMRGRRRG GGGRRMRRFRG!

MUDDLING_CUP.name: Muddling Cup
MUDDLING_CUP.descriptionLong:
A novelty cup that channels its contents along internal vessels

A conclusion that is preordained does not preclude a turbulent trip.

NACREOUS_RUDDER.name: Nacreous Rudder
NACREOUS_RUDDER.descriptionLong:
Bonus Air Acceleration: +50%
Bonus Ground Acceleration: +50%

A pearlescent rudder used for underwater mobility

Escaping the pull of the spiral at the world's demarcation requires an equivalent spiral of opposing orientation.

NICE_SHOES.name: Nice Shoes
NICE_SHOES.descriptionLong:
Bonus Ground Speed: +25%
Bonus Ground Acceleration: +25%

A pair of very nice shoes

Only a fool puts on his nicest shoes before stepping into the world's largest puddle.

NOCTILUCENT_PROMISE.name: Noctilucent Promise
NOCTILUCENT_PROMISE.description: Temporarily Gain Invulnerability upon Receiving Fatal Damage
NOCTILUCENT_PROMISE.descriptionLong:
Invincibility Duration: 3 Seconds
Activates once per life

An overwhelming brightness buried within a perfectly dark mass

Only by the hands of Salvagers can Management honor their promise made to those below without reneging on their promise to those above.

NUCLEAR_PUNCH_THRUSTERS.name: Nuclear Punch Thrusters
NUCLEAR_PUNCH_THRUSTERS.descriptionLong:
Bonus Knockback: +60%
Bonus Damage: +10%

A mechanized gauntlet powered with the wrath of a dying sun

The physics-defying nature of the False Sun would pique the interest of researchers were there still civilizations left to power.

NURDLER.name: Nurdler
NURDLER.descriptionLong:
Nurdler Interval: 0.2 Second
Nurdler Damage: 15

A handful of hardened, plastic pellets, byproduct of some long-lost industry

Through inconspicuousness, items of extreme worthlessness can sometimes evade the grinding blades of the Kamaboko-Ya.

NUTRILOG_CRUNCHBAR_PLUS.name: Nutrilog Crunchbar-Plus
NUTRILOG_CRUNCHBAR_PLUS.descriptionLong:
Bonus Max Hp: +100%
Bonus Knockback Resistance: +50%
Bonus Player Size: +80%
Size Change Activates Upon Spawning

A nutrient-flavored part of a complete breakfast

OL_FAITHFUL.name: Ol' Faithful
OL_FAITHFUL.descriptionLong:
Equip slot 1 weapon chosen in Hub (instead of default speargun)
(No effect without Weapon Drops enabled)

A rugged holster with the initials 'B.M' engraved

The callous currents of the Noiseless Sea have no qualms with separating a man from his most beloved possession.

ORIGIN_COIL.name: Origin Coil
ORIGIN_COIL.descriptionLong:
Bonus Clip Size: 25%

A delicate mechanism facilitating the spontaneous generation of life

The Garden of the Neptune King serves as a sanctuary for seeds taken by the Noiseless Sea before having a chance to germinate.

OUR_GET_ALONG_SHIRT.name: Our Get Along Shirt
OUR_GET_ALONG_SHIRT.description: Automatically Leash Yourself to a Nearby Character
OUR_GET_ALONG_SHIRT.descriptionLong:
A t-shirt large enough to be worn by 2 Salvagers at once

The Salvager training program puts little emphasis on cooperation, believing that fraternal attachment would be detrimental to the company mission.

PAIN_SCALE.name: Pain Scale
PAIN_SCALE.description: Gain Magic Charge upon Receiving Damage
PAIN_SCALE.descriptionLong:
Item Charge: 1 Second for every 5 Damage Received

A surgically attached LED light widget

During the training process, Salvagers have their pain replaced with an analog display that lights up if they should stop doing whatever they are doing.

PEACHWOOD_SWORD.name: Peachwood Sword
PEACHWOOD_SWORD.description: Release Vengeful Spirit upon Killing and Dying
PEACHWOOD_SWORD.descriptionLong:
Spirit Damage: 50 on Player Kill, 15 on Monster Kill

A wooden blade gnarled and knotted by time

Striking at spirits within the Noiseless Sea is a futile undertaking well suited for those looking to pass an eternity.

PEER_PRESSURE.name: Peer Pressure
PEER_PRESSURE.descriptionLong:
An unusual kinship with an unexpected ally

Salvagers have been resorting to increasingly regulation-violating measures to cope with the loneliness of the abyss.

PELICAN_PLUSH_TOY.name: Pelican Plush Toy
PELICAN_PLUSH_TOY.descriptionLong:
Heal Amplification: +50%

A soft and squeezable plush stuffed with unconditional love

Locked within the confines of a pressure-stable diving suit, a soft touch is indistinguishable from a harsh one.

PEPPER.name: Pepper
PEPPER.descriptionLong:
Damage Interval: 1.5 Seconds
Damage: 9

A blurry cloud of white noise vaguely in the shape of a cat

Bright Ones can take a variety of forms, from colossal stars to the slight blurriness in the corner of your eye.

PETRIFIED_PAYLOAD.name: Petrified Payload
PETRIFIED_PAYLOAD.description: Create Explosion upon Killing and Dying, Bigger Explosions
PETRIFIED_PAYLOAD.descriptionLong:
Explosion Damage: 50 on Player Kill, 20 on Monster Kill
Bonus Explosion Size: +30%

A bulging and volatile stack of decrepit munitions

Management has always had confidence that whatever lies at the bottom of the world could be dealt with using additional firepower.

PIFFLER.name: Piffler
PIFFLER.descriptionLong:
Projectile Pifflyness: +100%

A flaccid and flimsy trinket with no discernable use

Some salvaged artifacts shed valuable light on the nature of former humanity while others leave historians more confused than before.

PLUMPOWDER.name: Plumpowder
PLUMPOWDER.description: Magic is Fully Charged upon Spawning
PLUMPOWDER.descriptionLong:
A satchel of sweet and acidic crystals

The taste is better when you have less of it than you want.

RECYCLER_BOLUS.name: Recycler Bolus
RECYCLER_BOLUS.description: Gain Max Hp upon Eggplant Pickup
RECYCLER_BOLUS.descriptionLong:
Max Hp Gained: +5% per Eggplant
Max Hp Limit: +150%

A foul clump of mucus and undigested flesh

The resentful ingredients of the Kamaboko-Ya yearn to have their bodies remade in the shapes of the ones that terrorized them in life.

RED_TIDE_TALISMAN.name: Red Tide Talisman
RED_TIDE_TALISMAN.descriptionLong:
Fire Duration: 4 Seconds
Fire Damage: 3 Per Second.

A crimson pendant emitting an unhealthful warmth

A sudden influx of life precipitates a sudden influx of death.

RING_OF_TESTING.name: Ring of Testing
RING_OF_TESTING.descriptionLong: THIS ITEM IS USED FOR STRESS TESTING THE GAME. DO NOT USE THIS ARTIFACT.

ROYAL_JUJUBE_BANG.name: Royal Jujube Bang
ROYAL_JUJUBE_BANG.descriptionLong:
Bonus Long-Ranged Damage: +50%

An ornate ritual scepter carved from the wood of an extinct fruit tree

The three former Gods of the Noiseless Sea salvaged the body of the First Bright One, and as thanks, each received a celestial blessing.

SALIGRAM.name: Saligram
SALIGRAM.descriptionLong:
Damage Resistance: +15%

A petrified shell imbued with the blessing of the Spiral

As currents carry all sunken things to their remote resting places, many seek solace in the belief that, in time, they will all be reunited.

SAMURAI_SHARK.name: Samurai Shark
SAMURAI_SHARK.descriptionLong:
Crit Chance: 15%
Crit Damage: +75%
Crit Projectile Speed: +100%

The ultimate sharpening tool that puts a razor edge on dull blades

The secret is the tungsten-carbide blades along with a unique angle that gives you a precision edge each and every time.

SEAFOAM_PERIAPT.name: Seafoam Periapt
SEAFOAM_PERIAPT.descriptionLong:
Bonus Reload Speed: +20%
Bonus Ranged Attack Speed: +20%

A porous charm infused with an uplifting froth

Not even the body of the Whale-God, Callo, could contain the knowledge imparted by the First Bright One and, gradually, the excess drifted away as seafoam.

SENESCENT_SHIELD.name: Senescent Shield
SENESCENT_SHIELD.descriptionLong:
A tarnished shield that once held symbolic importance for some forgotten reason

Forgotten objects of worship may find new purpose basking in the shadow of the False Sun.

SHILLERS_DEATHCAP.name: Shiller's Deathcap
SHILLERS_DEATHCAP.descriptionLong:
Poison Cooldown: 1 Second
Poison Damage: 15 Per Second

A tangled fungal protrusion still producing clumps of unsavory spores

Both Bright Ones and those that congregate in their shadows share the desire for self-propagation.

SHIP_IN_A_BOTTLE.name: Ship in a Bottle
SHIP_IN_A_BOTTLE.descriptionLong:
Bonus Ammo: +50%

Bonus Reload Speed: +15%

An intricate model galleon inside of a glass bottle

We require a million little hands to construct the ship and a single big one to break the bottle.

SIMPLE_MIND.name: Simple Mind
SIMPLE_MIND.descriptionLong:
A blissful and empty state of mind

The key to upwards mobility within the Noiseless Sea is a mind that forgets all troubles.

SINKING_FEELING.name: Sinking Feeling
SINKING_FEELING.descriptionLong:
Bonus Fastfall Power: +100%

An abstract and incorporeal sentiment of despair

Salvagers are advised to surrender their memories of land; even if they were to ever resurface, it would not be as they had remembered.

SIREN_CHIME.name: Siren Chime
SIREN_CHIME.descriptionLong:
Bonus Knockback: -250%

An instrument whose tone changes according to the listener's desires

Within the unused lungs of each Sunk, a pupating siren sings with a voice that its host used to remember well.

SKIPPERS_BOX_OF_FUN.name: Skipper's Box of Fun
SKIPPERS_BOX_OF_FUN.descriptionLong:
Reroll Interval: 10 Seconds

A bottomless box continually coughing up smoke and weaponry

Humanity humbly accepts this offering, and with it, the firepower to defy the natural succession of higher beings.

SOUND_OF_SEAGULLS.name: Sound of Seagulls
SOUND_OF_SEAGULLS.descriptionLong:
Hover Cost Reduction: -20%

An echoing cry that makes you nostalgic for a place you've never been

Translated into human language, this sound consists mostly of expletives.

SWORD_OF_SYZYGY.name: Sword of Syzygy
SWORD_OF_SYZYGY.descriptionLong:
Projectile Pierce: +3 Enemies
Bonus Damage: +15%

A light thrusting-sword with a hilt in the likeness of a lunar eclipse

Inexplicable phenomena are said to occur when sunken Bright Ones align with their heavenly counterparts.

TEMPEST_TEAPOT.name: Tempest Teapot
TEMPEST_TEAPOT.descriptionLong:
Bonus Airblast Power: +50%
Bonus Airblast Size: +75%

A porcelain teapot whose turbulent contents never settle

Stagnation is the foremost obstacle to Management's visions, so sometimes a Salvager is needed to stir the pot.

TENUOUS_GRIP_ON_REALITY.name: Tenuous Grip on Reality
TENUOUS_GRIP_ON_REALITY.description: Become Invisible upon Reloading an Empty Clip
TENUOUS_GRIP_ON_REALITY.descriptionLong:
Invisibility Duration: 150% Reload Time

The creeping realization that your senses are betraying you

The true nature of reality is the moon's reflection in the uppermost pot of a miscalibrated water clock.

TOME_OF_PHILOPATRY.name: Tome of Philopatry
TOME_OF_PHILOPATRY.descriptionLong:
A textbook instructing newborns how to develop proper natal homing instincts

The bookshelves of the Pit of Tongues make paper and binding of otherwise unwritten and primal knowledge.

TRIGGERFISH_FINGER.name: Triggerfish Finger
TRIGGERFISH_FINGER.descriptionLong:
Bonus Attack Speed: +20%
Bonus Reload Speed: +40%

The disembodied digit of a fish known for its propensity for violence

A Salvager can blindly fire any shot in the ocean and still know that they have struck the source of their misfortune.

TUNICATE_TUNIC.name: Tunicate Tunic
TUNICATE_TUNIC.descriptionLong:
Knockback Resistance: +75%
Bonus Max Mp: +10%

An adhesive piece of clothing ideal for staying in place

The tunicate is known for its tendency to digest its own brain, a habit that marine biologists surmise is the result of an insatiable hunger for brains.

TYPHON_FANG.name: Typhon Fang
TYPHON_FANG.descriptionLong:
Clip Refilled on Player Kill: 100% Max Clip Size
Clip Refilled on Monster Kill: 1

The razor-sharp tooth of an extinct titan

According to Goldfish scripture, any individual that ascends to the uppermost layer of the world is rewarded with divine form.

UNBREATHING_MEMBRANE.name: Unbreathing Membrane
UNBREATHING_MEMBRANE.descriptionLong:
A thick and non-porous membrane that smothers all movement

A Sunk is born upon a former person's cessation of breath.

VESTIGIAL_CHAMBER.name: Vestigial Chamber
VESTIGIAL_CHAMBER.descriptionLong:
Explosion Delay: 0.75s
Explosion Damage: 32

An obsolete organ used to manipulate density

The currents of the Noiseless Sea carry objects, not according to their buoyancies, but rather the nature of their desires, regrets and experiences.

VOID_HYPONOME.name: Void Hyponome
VOID_HYPONOME.descriptionLong:
Airblast Cost Reduction: -25%

A rubbery tube used for water propulsion

All mobility within the Noiseless Sea is born from an individual's affinity for or aversion to the all-consuming void.

VOLATILE_DERMIS.name: Volatile Dermis
VOLATILE_DERMIS.descriptionLong:
Lightning Cooldown: 4 Seconds
Lightning Damage: 15
Lightning Chain: 3

A fleshy sheet crackling with an unstable current

Even the incomprehensible beings of the deep can be influenced by a little negative reinforcement.

VOW_OF_EMPTY_HANDS.name: Vow of Empty Hands
VOW_OF_EMPTY_HANDS.description: -2 Weapon Slots. +Clip Size, Reload Speed and Damage
VOW_OF_EMPTY_HANDS.descriptionLong:
Bonus Clip Size: +15%
Bonus Reload Speed: +30%
Bonus Damage: +45%

WHITE_SMOKER.name: White Smoker
WHITE_SMOKER.descriptionLong:
Fire Duration: 4 Seconds
Fire Damage: 3
Hover Cost Reduction: -15%

An organic tube structure emanating an endless stream of pale smoke

As the only sources of energy in an otherwise closed system, Bright Ones foment new life within the vicinity, usually in their own likeness.

WHITE_WHALE_CHARM.name: White Whale Charm
WHITE_WHALE_CHARM.descriptionLong:
Bonus Projectile Size: +40%
Bonus Damage: +40%
Ranged Attack Speed Reduction: -50%

An ornamental artifact carved from the tusk of the white whale

The Whale-God, Callo, dreamt of an eye at the bottom of the sea and the world that lay beneath its unblinking gaze.

WRATH_OF_THE_FROGMAN.name: Wrath of the Frogman
WRATH_OF_THE_FROGMAN.descriptionLong:
Missile Interval: 0.65 Seconds
Missile Damage: 18

A pair of webbed gloves worn by amphibious assassins

Once feared by all submariners, the Frogman's reign of terror ceased when their coastal hunting grounds became submerged.

YIGHT_KITE.name: Yight Kite
YIGHT_KITE.descriptionLong:
A spool of imperceptible, yet durable string

Fishing lines and similar items are collected by the Sunk who use them to tether themselves to the things they value.
